recruitment.name: Inquisitor Vane
recruitment.rationale: Religious faction unlocks Temple district and Religious courtiers (High Priest Matthias, Sister Evangeline) for future petition paths. Level 2 status makes Inquisitor Vane a promotion candidate for cycle transition. Positions conspiracy toward Council of Lords (11 VP, requires Seraphina + Aldric + High Priest) and Imperial Mandate pathway.

actions.rationale: Secure majority control (2/2 slots) of Maritime courtier. This achieves instant control of a 2-slot courtier, the most efficient courtier acquisition available. Advances Maritime Rights petition (requires COURT_011 + COURT_012 = 4 VP + move 3 influence). Sets up petition completion within 2 turns.

free_actions.rationale: Deploy remaining influence pool (5 cubes) to second Maritime courtier. Achieves majority control of 4-slot courtier with 5 influence (secure against opposition). Next turn can complete Maritime Rights petition by confirming COURT_012 control (already secured this turn).

strategic_rationale: Turn 3 optimization focuses on dual-axis advancement: (1) Gold generation for cycle-end VP conversion (13 gold = 4 VP potential), (2) Courtier control for petition completion pathway. Maritime Rights petition (4 VP) completes Turn 4 with both Maritime courtiers controlled. Two-turn petition completion represents high-efficiency VP accumulation (2 VP per turn investment). Inquisitor Vane recruitment unlocks Religious faction, opening Council of Lords pathway (11 VP) and Imperial Mandate pathway (12 VP, requires both Military + both Noble courtiers). Current VP deficit (32 vs P2:55, P3:45) requires rapid petition completion rate. Maritime Rights (4 VP) + Council of Lords (11 VP, if executed) + Imperial Mandate (12 VP, if promoted agents secure positions) = 27 VP swing achievable within 3 remaining C2 turns. Gold accumulation (13) positions for cycle transition VP conversion and agent upgrade investments. Exposure remains 0 (no scapegoat risk), allowing continued strategic flexibility. Multi-faction positioning (Military, Commercial, Maritime, Noble, Criminal, Religious via Inquisitor recruitment) enables maximum petition pathway optionality.
